output:
All these pathways of the mind Struggling to sort and bind
The link connecting dissipates As it all, as it all just fades
Time becomes our enemy Haunting us as we just breathe
Who we are evaporates As it all, as it all just fades
No one knows at first glance The struggle keeping you in trance
All these pathways of the mind Struggling to sort and bind
The link connecting dissipates As it all, as it all just fades
